column2: You stand in the study hall of the university.\nTo the north is the entrance to the archive library of mechanics.
You are in the Archive Library of Mechanics. Leather bound books adorn the wall to wall shelves.\nTo the north is a dark passage.
You are in an old brick-clad room illuminated by flickering oil sconces housing the rear stairwell.\nThe winding stone stairs lead up.
You are at the top of the turret in an old dusty room with round oak table.
